abstract: A couple has been awarded $1 million for information that led to an insider trading settlement against Pequot Capital Management, a prominent hedge fund.
snippet: A couple has been awarded $1 million for information that led to an insider trading settlement against Pequot Capital Management, a prominent hedge fund.
lead_paragraph: A couple has been awarded $1 million for information that led to an insider trading settlement against Pequot Capital Management, a prominent hedge fund, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Whistle-Blowers Awarded $1 Million in Pequot Case

abstract: The European Commission says that I.B.M. might have abused its dominant position in the mainframe computer market.
snippet: The European Commission says that I.B.M. might have abused its dominant position in the mainframe computer market.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN  The European Commission opened investigations Monday into whether I.B.M. had abused its dominant position in mainframe computers, signaling that the era of aggressive prosecution of American technology leaders in Europe did not end with the Microsoft antitrust case.

headline.main: Europe to Investigate Antitrust Complaints Over I.B.M. Mainframes
headline.print_headline: Europe to Investigate Antitrust Complaints Over I.B.M. Mainframes
